statements: SELECT * FROM audit_trails;
SELECT trail_id, action FROM audit_trails ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT user_id, date FROM audit_trails WHERE action = 'login';
SELECT trail_id, data FROM audit_trails WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT action, COUNT(*) FROM audit_trails GROUP BY action;
SELECT * FROM audit_trails WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, action, date FROM audit_trails WHERE action IN ('Login', 'Logout') AND date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28'
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM audit_trails WHERE DATE(date) = CURDATE()
SELECT user_id, COUNT(trail_id) AS trail_count FROM audit_trails GROUP BY user_id HAVING trail_count > 5 ORDER BY trail_count DESC
SELECT * FROM audit_trails WHERE data->'$.result' = 'success' ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT * FROM audit_trails WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT action, timestamp FROM audit_trails WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT description FROM compliance_data WHERE id = 5;
SELECT id, action, description FROM compliance_data WHERE user_id = 10 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_actions FROM audit_trails GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_actions > 5;
SELECT * FROM audit_trails WHERE action = 'login';
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM compliance_data WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, action, user_id FROM audit_trails WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_data WHERE user_id = 3 AND action LIKE '%delete%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, user_id, details FROM audit_trails WHERE details IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM audit_trail;
SELECT id, action, user_id FROM audit_trail WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT timestamp, action FROM audit_trail WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM compliance_data WHERE compliance_status = 'Compliant';
SELECT id, app_name FROM financial_applications ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM audit_trail WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM compliance_data WHERE compliance_status = 'COMPLIANT';
SELECT entity_id, compliance_status FROM compliance_data WHERE compliance_status = 'NON-COMPLIANT' ORDER BY compliance_status ASC;
SELECT app_name, app_description FROM financial_applications WHERE app_version LIKE '1.%';
SELECT id, action, user_id FROM audit_trail WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM audit_trails ORDER BY event_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT event_type, user_id FROM audit_trails WHERE action='login';
SELECT app_name, developer FROM decentralized_financial_apps WHERE platform='iOS';
SELECT * FROM compliance_data WHERE compliant=true AND compliance_date>'2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_date, amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE from_account=123456 AND to_account=7891011 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM audit_trails ORDER BY event_date DESC, event_type ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, event_type, user_id FROM audit_trails WHERE user_id = 100 AND event_type = 'LOGIN' ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_data WHERE compliance_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND compliant = TRUE ORDER BY compliance_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, app_name, platform, developer FROM decentralized_financial_apps WHERE platform = 'iOS' ORDER BY deployment_date ASC;
SELECT id, transaction_date, amount, from_account, to_account FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM audit_trail;
SELECT user_id, action FROM audit_trail WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT id, user_id, amount FROM financial_transactions ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT role_id, role_name, description FROM roles WHERE description LIKE '%management%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username, email, role FROM users WHERE role = 'manager' ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, role FROM users INNER JOIN roles ON users.role = roles.role_name WHERE roles.description LIKE '%access%';
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM financial_transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT u.username, c.description FROM users AS u LEFT JOIN compliance_data AS c ON u.user_id = c.user_id WHERE c.rule_id = 3;
